text:
="preserve">The Indian Military Historical Society is an organisation in the United Kingdom (UK).It was made in 1983.
The main purpose of the Society is to encourage research and study of the history of the old colonial British Indian Army, although some study is also done on the present day Indian Army and Pakistan Army too. Members of this organisation belong to the UK, and many countries from the British Commonwealth of Nations. It also publishes a well-known journal, "Durbar", in which many historians and scholars print their research work.
